column4: Anyway when typing sudo it grants you the root powers for some time.
Anyone who knows how to make some XP/Ubuntu dual boot ?
install  ubuntu first, leave unpartitioned space at the start of the drive, install windows to there, then reinstall grub froma live cd
you'll have to add windows to your grub list
there's no way for it to automatically detect it
Everytime i installed Ubuntu it detected Windows automatically =)
perhapss, but if you install ubuntu first, it's not there for it tto detect
it's not grub detecting xp, it's the ubuntu installer
if you listen to me i'm trying to explain it to you
No, because it detected it in the "import settings" thing
yes, that's part of the ubuntu installer
ubuntu would have been detecting it atg some stage and automatically updating your menu.lst file
